snippet.title: The Sims 3 University Life -- Announce Trailer
snippet.description: The Sims 3 University Life opens up new opportunities for your Sims, from social connections to career growth. From class activities to major‐specific objects, your Sims will find new ways to learn. Text books and study groups are a big part of university, but sometimes Sims just need to party!  Throw a juice keg party in your dorm, or flirt at a bonfire party—there's a lot to explore outside of lectures at the student union. With new locations like the bowling alley and SimBurger to visit, and new activities like joining a protest, and spray painting murals to enjoy, your Sims are sure to have the time of their lives!
